channel.title: CVE Feed for Mahlamusa -- Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mahlamusa -- Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter

item.title: CVE-2023-47558|2023-12-18T22:53:51.597Z -- mahlamusa -- who%20hit%20the%20page%20%E2%80%93%20hit%20counter
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Mahlamusa Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter: from n/a through 1.4.14.3.

item.title: CVE-2023-46087|2023-10-16T14:28:08.971Z -- mahlamusa -- who%20hit%20the%20page%20%E2%80%93%20hit%20counter
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Mahlamusa Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter plugin <= 1.4.14.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-25466|2023-08-30T15:23:15.988Z -- mahlamusa -- who%20hit%20the%20page%20%E2%80%93%20hit%20counter
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Mahlamusa Who Hit The Page – Hit Counter plugin <= 1.4.14.3 versions.
